Content Archive

Access our library of recorded lectures, seminars, and workshops

YouTube Channel Facebook Page

Seminar 10: An overview of condensed matter physics and density function theory

Dr. Musa A. M. Hussien December 16, 2023

A comprehensive overview of condensed matter physics from theoretical and computational perspectives, focusing on the complexity of materials with numerous components and their interactions, and the necessity of computational methods in their study.

Watch on YouTube Facebook Recording

Seminar 13: Electromagnetic Theory and Maxwell's Equations

Prof. Arbab Ibrahim January 13, 2024

An exploration of electromagnetic theory's completeness and its potential connections to other physical theories through modifications of Maxwell's equations, presented by one of Sudan's leading physicists.

Watch on YouTube Facebook Recording

Seminar 1: The Similarities Between Gravity and Electromagnetism

Prof. Arbab Ibrahim September 6, 2023

An insightful exploration of the fascinating parallels between gravity and electromagnetism, examining how these fundamental forces shape our universe and interconnect in remarkable ways.

Watch on YouTube Facebook Recording

Seminar 2: Unification of gauge coupling constants beyond the standard model

Dr. Ammar Ibrahim October 7, 2023

A deep dive into particle physics, exploring atomic nucleus components, their interactions, and their relationship with nature's four fundamental forces.

Watch on YouTube Facebook Recording

Seminar 8: Extraction physics from future surveys with artificial intelligence

Dr. Sultan Hassan November 25, 2023

Exploring how AI algorithms and supercomputers are revolutionizing scientific research, enabling data extraction and predictions based on past research data.

Watch on YouTube Facebook Recording

Seminar 1, S2: The Role of Renewable Energy in Development

Prof. Adel Haseep February 15, 2025

A comprehensive exploration of renewable energy's role in sustainable development, stability, and environmental protection, featuring expert discussions and insights.

Watch on YouTube Facebook Recording
